paper_abstract: We present complete simplicial fan realizations of any spherical subword complex of type for . This provides complete simplicial fan realizations of simplicial multi-associahedra , whose facets are in correspondence with -triangulations of a convex -gon. This solves the first open case of the problem of finding fan realizations where polytopality is not known. We also present fan realizations of two previously unknown cases of subword complexes of type , namely the multi-associahedra and Delta(9,2) and Delta(11,3).
paper_title: Fan Realizations of Type Subword Complexes and Multi-associahedra of Rank 3
